attributes.comment:
As a adoptive parent waiting for a child referral, I oppose the fee
increase which amounts to over 100%!

Currently:
I600A: $545

Fingerprints: $70 x 2 = $140

Total: $685

What it will for China adoptions that has a 18-20 month wait, the proposed
increase:

I600A: $670 x 2 = $1340

Fingerprints: $80 x 4 = $ 320

Total: $1660

That's an increase of $975 or over 140%!

And that's not even taking into consideration the fact that applying for our
children's Certificate of Citizenship (for IR4 visas) goes from $215 to
$460, a difference of $245 or about 120% increase. Sometimes, we don't even
get the certificates for a year after filing!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Marian Tang
